Description: 3 fragments of parchment sheets from a codex in a fine hand. 2 include centre fold. On the recto, the fragments, in descending order from the top of the glass frame, preserve 9, 14, and 8 lines of Coptic script respectively. The topmost one also has 7 lines in a smaller majuscule hand partially preserved on the page across the centre fold. On the verso, again in descending order from the top of the glass frame, the fragments have 8, 14, and 8 lines of Coptic script. Both the topmost and bottommost fragments preserve 6 and 2 very damaged lines from the pages across the centre fold. Mounted with EA 75340.
